relation_pairs: Copies the contents of one file to another. This function will also copy the permission bits of the original file to the destination file.
This function will overwrite the contents of to.
On success, the total number of bytes copied is returned and it is equal to the length of the to file as reported by metadata.
Unix: corresponds to open with O_RDONLY for from and O_WRONLY, O_CREAT, and O_TRUNC for to
The from path is not a file
The from file does not exist
Permission rights to access from or write to
